name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Vote] Voting for the top ten Chinese public issues in 2022 
This vote aims to leave a public memory of 2022 for the Chinese Internet.
All options are randomly arranged. I hope everyone can choose 10-12 of the most important public issues in 2022 in your mind.
The final results will be announced on December 31, 2022.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Original video:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The personal experience is speechless
Sky-high air tickets, sky-high nucleic acid tests, circuit breakers, and a maximum quarantine of 14+14 plus 7
In the past few years of the epidemic, how many international students could not afford to buy tickets to go home, and how many international students who bought tickets were temporarily stranded abroad due to circuit breakers, and how many international students collapsed and became depressed or even committed suicide in a foreign country because they could not get tickets, and now they say that China has always believed that epidemic prevention measures should be scientific and moderate and should not affect normal personnel exchanges.
I don’t know how to evaluate this sentence for a moment

content:
Netizen contribution
People's Daily: Twelve sentences to remember 2022
Comment area:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
After students left the school for the holidays, the security department of Dalian University of Technology issued a notice to clear all electric bikes on campus, and the company bought back the electric bikes that students had purchased for thousands of yuan at a low price of a few hundred yuan. After that, students could only use the high-priced shared electric bikes on campus for commuting.
It is said that the price of a single ride is 2 yuan per ride, and the monthly card has now increased directly from 9.9 yuan to 29.9 yuan, and the number of times the monthly card can be used is difficult to meet daily commuting.
